scripts.build:circuit:compile: npx circom circuits/bullsCows.circom -o build/circuits/bullsCows.json && npx snarkjs info -c build/circuits/bullsCows.json
scripts.build:circuit:setup: npx snarkjs setup --protocol groth -c build/circuits/bullsCows.json --pk build/circuits/bullsCows_proving_key.json --vk build/circuits/bullsCows_verification_key.json
scripts.build:circuit: mkdir -p build/circuits && npm run build:circuit:compile && npm run build:circuit:setup
scripts.test:circuit: npm run build:circuit && npx snarkjs calculatewitness -c build/circuits/bullsCows.json -i circuits/bc_input.json -w build/circuits/witness.json && npx snarkjs proof -w build/circuits/witness.json --pk build/circuits/bullsCows_proving_key.json -p build/circuits/proof.json --pub build/circuits/public.json && npx snarkjs verify --vk build/circuits/bullsCows_verification_key.json -p build/circuits/proof.json --pub build/circuits/public.json
